raw_text:
Senior Project Manager - Digital Transformation

TechGlobal Solutions is seeking an experienced Senior Project Manager to lead digital transformation initiatives.

Location: Dubai, UAE
Salary: $130,000 - $160,000

Requirements:
• 8+ years project management experience
• PMP certification required
• Bachelor's degree required, MBA preferred
• Experience with banking/financial services
• Strong agile and stakeholder management skills
• Experience with Jira and cloud technologies
